verses.verse: It happened <S%H310>after<s%> these <S%H1697>things,<s%> that the <S%H8248>butler<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> and his <S%H644>baker<s%> <S%H2398>offended<s%> their <S%H113>lord,<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>
<S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> was <S%H7107>angry<s%> <S%H5921>with<s%> his <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H5631>officers,<s%> the <S%H8269>chief<s%> <S%H8248>cupbearer<s%> and the <S%H8269>chief<s%> <S%H644>baker.<s%>

He <S%H5414>put<s%> them in <S%H4929>custody<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H8269>captain<s%> of the <S%H2876>guard,<s%> into the <S%H1004>prison,<s%> the <S%H4725>place<s%> where <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> was <S%H631>bound.<s%>
The <S%H8269>captain<s%> of the <S%H2876>guard<s%> <S%H6485>assigned<s%> them to <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> and he took <S%H8334>care<s%> of <S%H4929>them.<s%> They stayed in prison many <S%H3117>days.<s%>

They <S%H8147>both<s%> <S%H2492>dreamed<s%> a <S%H2472>dream,<s%> each <S%H376>man<s%> his <S%H2472>dream,<s%> in <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3915>night,<s%> each <S%H376>man<s%> according to the <S%H6623>interpretation<s%> of his <S%H2472>dream,<s%> the <S%H8248>cupbearer<s%> and the <S%H644>baker<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> who were <S%H631>bound<s%> in the <S%H1004>prison.<s%>
<S%H3130>Joseph<s%> came <S%H935>in<s%> to them <S%H935>in<s%> the <S%H1242>morning,<s%> and saw <S%H2196>them,<s%> and saw that they were sad.

He <S%H7592>asked<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>'s <S%H5631>officers<s%> who were with him in <S%H4929>custody<s%> in his <S%H113>master<s%>'s <S%H1004>house,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "Why do you <S%H6440>look<s%> so <S%H7451>sad<s%> <S%H3117>today?<s%>"

They <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H2492>him,<s%> "We have dreamed a <S%H2472>dream,<s%> and there is no one who can <S%H6622>interpret<s%> <S%H3130>it.<s%>" Joseph <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H6623>them,<s%> "Don't interpretations belong to <S%H430>God?<s%> Please tell it to <S%H5608>me.<s%>"

The <S%H8269>chief<s%> <S%H8248>cupbearer<s%> <S%H5608>told<s%> his <S%H2472>dream<s%> to <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H2472>him,<s%> "In my dream, <S%H1612>behold,<s%> a vine was in front of <S%H6440>me,<s%>

and in the <S%H1612>vine<s%> were <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H8299>branches.<s%> It was as though it <S%H6524>budded,<s%> it <S%H5322>blossomed,<s%> and its <S%H811>clusters<s%> <S%H5927>produced<s%> <S%H1310>ripe<s%> <S%H6025>grapes.<s%>

<S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>'s <S%H3563>cup<s%> was in my <S%H3027>hand;<s%> and I <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H6025>grapes,<s%> and <S%H7818>pressed<s%> them into <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>'s <S%H3563>cup,<s%> and I <S%H5414>gave<s%> the <S%H3563>cup<s%> into <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>'s <S%H3709>hand.<s%>"
<S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H6623>him,<s%> "This is its interpretation: the <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H8299>branches<s%> are <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3117>days.<s%>

<S%H5750>Within<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> more <S%H3117>days,<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> will lift <S%H5375>up<s%> your <S%H7218>head,<s%> and <S%H7725>restore<s%> you to your <S%H3653>office.<s%> You will <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>'s <S%H3563>cup<s%> into his <S%H3027>hand,<s%> the <S%H4941>way<s%> you did when you <S%H7223>were<s%> his <S%H8248>cupbearer.<s%>

But <S%H2142>remember<s%> me when it will be <S%H3190>well<s%> with <S%H6213>you,<s%> and please show <S%H2617>kindness<s%> to <S%H2142>me,<s%> and make mention of me to <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> and bring <S%H3318>me<s%> out of this <S%H1004>house.<s%>

For <S%H1589>indeed,<s%> I was stolen away out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H5680>Hebrews,<s%> and here also have I <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H3972>nothing<s%> that they should <S%H7760>put<s%> me into the <S%H953>dungeon.<s%>"

When the <S%H8269>chief<s%> <S%H644>baker<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that the <S%H6622>interpretation<s%> was <S%H2896>good,<s%> he <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> "I <S%H637>also<s%> was in my <S%H2472>dream,<s%> and <S%H7969>behold,<s%> three <S%H5536>baskets<s%> of <S%H2751>white<s%> bread were on my <S%H7218>head.<s%>

In the <S%H5945>uppermost<s%> <S%H5536>basket<s%> there was all <S%H3978>kinds<s%> of baked <S%H4639>food<s%> for <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> and the <S%H5775>birds<s%> <S%H398>ate<s%> them out of the <S%H5536>basket<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> my <S%H7218>head.<s%>"
<S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H6030>answered,<s%> <S%H559>"This<s%> is its <S%H6623>interpretation.<s%> The <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H5536>baskets<s%> are <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3117>days.<s%>

Within <S%H7969>three<s%> more <S%H3117>days,<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> will lift <S%H5375>up<s%> your <S%H7218>head<s%> from off <S%H8518>you,<s%> and will hang you on a <S%H6086>tree;<s%> and the <S%H5775>birds<s%> will <S%H398>eat<s%> your flesh from off <S%H1320>you.<s%>"

It happened the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> which was <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>'s <S%H3117>birthday,<s%> that he <S%H6213>made<s%> a <S%H4960>feast<s%> for all his <S%H5650>servants,<s%> and he lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> the <S%H7218>head<s%> of the <S%H8269>chief<s%> <S%H8248>cupbearer<s%> and the head of the <S%H8269>chief<s%> <S%H644>baker<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> his <S%H5650>servants.<s%>

He <S%H7725>restored<s%> the <S%H8269>chief<s%> <S%H8248>cupbearer<s%> to his <S%H4945>position<s%> <S%H7725>again,<s%> and he <S%H5414>gave<s%> the <S%H3563>cup<s%> into <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>'s <S%H3709>hand;<s%>
but he <S%H8518>hanged<s%> the <S%H8269>chief<s%> <S%H644>baker,<s%> as <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> had interpreted to <S%H6622>them.<s%>
Yet the <S%H8269>chief<s%> <S%H8248>cupbearer<s%> <S%H2142>didn't<s%> remember <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> but forgot <S%H7911>him.<s%>
